name: PressMate AI
description: PressMate AI is an agentic LLM that transforms internal briefings, corporate style guides, and SEO keywords into fully‑drafted, brand‑compliant press releases ready for distribution. The system extracts event details, applies tone and formatting rules, optimises for search, and can even generate media lists and schedule publication, delivering a turnkey solution for PR teams and marketers.

tools.name: extract_brief
tools.description: Extracts the core event details (who, what, when, where, why) from a raw internal briefing document supplied as plain text.

briefing_text.description: The full text of the internal briefing or memo.

tools.name: fetch_style_guide
tools.description: Retrieves the company's press‑release style guide (JSON format) from a given URL or file path so the LLM can enforce brand tone, headline rules, and formatting conventions.

guide_url.description: HTTPS URL or local file path pointing to the JSON style guide.

tools.name: get_seo_keywords
tools.description: Generates a list of SEO‑optimized keywords based on a short product or event description and optional language/region settings.

topic.description: Brief description of the product, service, or event.

tools.name: draft_release
tools.description: Creates a first‑draft press release using extracted event details, the corporate style guide, and the SEO keyword list.

event_details.description: Key‑value pairs describing the event (e.g., title, date, location, quote).

style_guide.description: Parsed style‑guide JSON that defines tone, headline caps, etc.

seo_keywords.description: Array of SEO keywords to sprinkle into the draft.

tools.name: proofread_release
tools.description: Runs grammar, spelling, brand‑tone, and readability checks on a draft and returns an annotated, corrected version.

draft_text.description: The raw press‑release draft produced by draft_release.

tools.name: format_release
tools.description: Applies final formatting (HTML, Markdown, or plain‑text) according to the style guide and returns the release ready for publishing or distribution.

proofread_text.description: The corrected press‑release text after proofreading.

tools.name: distribution_list_generator
tools.description: Generates a CSV‑formatted media contact list based on industry, region, and outlet type to accelerate distribution.

industry.description: Target industry for the press release (e.g., "consumer‑tech").

region.description: Geographic region for the distribution (e.g., "North America").

max_contacts.description: Maximum number of contacts to return.

tools.name: schedule_publication
tools.description: Posts the formatted press release to a specified distribution platform via its API and returns a confirmation identifier.

scheduled_time.description: ISO‑8601 timestamp for when the release should go live.

examples.description: User requests a brand‑new press release for the launch of the EcoFit smartwatch; the assistant extracts details, pulls the style guide, generates SEO keywords, drafts, proofreads, formats, and returns the final HTML release.

messages.content:
EcoFit Unveils EcoFit Pro – A Fitness Smartwatch Designed for a Healthier Future

San Francisco, March 15 2025 – EcoFit, a leader in sustainable wearables, today announced the launch of EcoFit Pro, a next‑generation fitness smartwatch that combines heart‑rate monitoring, advanced sleep analysis, and an AI‑powered fitness coach. \"Our goal is to empower everyone to live healthier lives,\" said Maya Patel, CEO of EcoFit. The EcoFit Pro is built with recycled aluminum and a solar‑assist battery, positioning it as the most eco‑friendly smartwatch on the market.

Key features include:
- Continuous heart‑rate monitoring with medical‑grade accuracy
- Sleep analysis with personalized recommendations
- AI‑coach that creates adaptive workout plans
- Ultra‑durable, recycled‑material chassis

EcoFit Pro will be available worldwide beginning April 1 2025 at major retailers and via ecofit.com.
